fantastic! it works like a charm...absolutely wonderful. Graphics:perfect.

CHEATS: to unlock all cars,tracks... 



go to /library/preferences/codemasters/colin mc rae rally mac/   
copy and backup the option file to desktop or whatever you like.
then, open the "options" file with an hex editor.  The first line should look like this:

08 00 00 00 64 64 64 02 00 00 00 00 FF 00 00 00 FF 00 00 00 22 22 22 22  .

Save the file. Exit. Run the game...Enjoy.

If it doesn't work for you, i'll upload the option file.

J
